'''Diamond''' is an [[ore]] found in the [[Overworld]]. It spawn naturally as diamond ore, which drops diamonds. Diamonds can be used to craft various items, tools, armor, and blocks.

== ''Minecraft'' ==
=== Items ===
* {{ItemLink|Diamond}}, obtained from mining diamond ore; it is used to craft tools, weapons, armor, and blocks
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Axe}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Hoe}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Pickaxe}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Shovel}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Sword}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Spear}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Helmet}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Chestplate}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Leggings}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Boots}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Horse Armor}}
* {{ItemLink|Diamond Nautilus Armor}}

=== Blocks ===
* {{BlockLink|Diamond Ore}}, a rare and desirable ore found deep underground
* {{BlockLink|Deepslate Diamond Ore}}, a variant of diamond ore found in the [[deepslate]] layer of the world
* {{BlockLink|Block of Diamond}}, crafted from 9 diamonds, it can be used for compact diamond storage or for decoration

=== Advancement and achievement ===
* [[Advancement#Diamonds!|Diamonds!]] - An [[advancement]] completed by acquiring diamonds.
* [[Achievement#DIAMONDS!|DIAMONDS!]] - An [[achievement]] obtained by acquiring diamonds.
